类 FOOPServer

版本:

      public FOOPServer()

  • 方法详细资料

    • startFOOPServer

      public static void startFOOPServer​(int p)
      Start the Foop Server
      参数:
      p - the port of Fiat server

    • receiveRegister

      public static void receiveRegister() throws IOException
      Handle the receive register message from client
      抛出:
      IOException - IO problem when receiving message

    • handleAddition

      public static void handleAddition​(Add add)
      Handle the addition item and send back to All register clients
      参数:
      add - for addition item

    • handleRegisterInfo

      public static void handleRegisterInfo​(DatagramPacket packet, byte[] buffer)
      Handle register information from clients
      参数:
      packet - received and send datagram packet
      buffer - received and send buffer

    • alreadyRegister

      public static boolean alreadyRegister​(Register register)
      check whether client address and port registered.
      参数:
      register - received register information from the client
      返回:
      if not registered return true, if already registered return false

    • receiveOtherMessage

      public static void receiveOtherMessage​(String temp, int id, DatagramPacket packet) throws IOException
      Handle receive any other FOOP message
      参数:
      temp - received message
      id - the message code
      packet - the datagram packet want to send
      抛出:
      IOException - if IO problem when receiving or sending message

    • closeSerevr

      public static void closeSerevr()
      Close the FOOP Server
